income_messages:
From: m************e@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-26 03:01:39
SUBJECT: MEGA MILLION LOTTO,
MEGA MILLION LOTTO,
AWARD DEPARTMENT LOTTERY.
4740 E. UNIVERSITY DRIVE, PHOENIX, AZ 85034 UNITED STATES.
REF NO: BIC/01-MSWA-L/200-26937
BATCH: 2022MJL-03
ELECTRONIC MAIL AWARD WINNING NOTIFICATION PRESENTATION
CENTER: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
Dear Lucky Winner:
Read the full details and forward your data to the claim officer for
the processing of your payment: -
We are pleased to inform you of the announcement today of winners of
the MEGA MILLIONS JACKPOT LOTTO WINNINGS PROGRAMS held on 20th January
2023, your e-mail address is attached to winning  serial number
S/N-00168 drew the lucky numbers 887-13-865-37-10-83, and consequently
won in the first lottery category.
You have therefore been approved for lump sums pay out of
$3,000,000.00 UNITED STATE DOLLARS in cash Credited to file REF
NO:BIC/01-MSW-L/200-26937  this is from total prize money of
$30,000,000.00, shared among the Five (5) international lucky winners
in this category.
All participants E-mail addresses were selected through our Microsoft
computer ballot system drawn from 50,000 Individual Names, 30,000
companies names from each continent, as part of International "E-MAIL"
Promotions Program, Which is conducted annually for our prominent MS
WORD.
 Your payment has been insured under the US Insurance commission
(BIC) with REF NO:BIC/01-MSW-L/200-26937, Please note that, you are to
contact your claims officer via email.
You have the right to call the Claim Payment Officer Steve Richard on
Telephone number to confirm your winning, as he will provide you with
the necessary details on how to claim Your prize. You are to keep your
ref.number and batch number from the public, until you have been
processed and your prize money delivered to you.
Be informed that all prize money must be claimed not later than two
weeks of this Notification, All funds not Claimed on or before the
fixed date will be with-held accordingly. Do contact the Claim Officer
immediately for further guidelines via E-mail:
megalottoffice@gmail.com
  by forwarding the verification data to him.
VERIFICATION
1, Full Name:
2, Full Contact Address:
3, Tel:/Fax:
4, Country of Origin:
5, Date of Birth:
6, Sex:
7, Occupation:
Best Regards
Maria Thomas.
For MEGA MILLIONS LOTTO PROMO USA.
From: m************e@gmail.com
To: uv08531@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-27 13:18:57
SUBJECT: Fill out the attached form and return back
Dear Lucky Winner,
I write to acknowledge the receipt of your e-mail and the information therein.
Yes, the message you received is nothing, but the truth, your e-mail
address worn the price for you as such, you should count yourself
lucky.
Note, in order to commence the processing of your award price sum of
USD$3 Million  you will have to fill the attach Form and accompany it
back with any means of yourself identification Id.
Congratulation.
Steve Richard (Payment Coordinator)
For Mega Millions Lotto USA.
From: m************e@gmail.com
To: uv08531@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-27 15:39:00
SUBJECT: Attention: Lucky Winner
Attention: Lucky Winner,
Your sent information was sighted and confirmed.
Be informed that I have forwarded your information to the concerned
department for the issuance of your Award Winning Certificate, and as
soon as your Award Certificate is ready, I shall forward it to you for
your perusal.
Meanwhile base on the payment mode you chose,as your payment
Coordinator I will like to inform you to prepare your flying down to
the state for the execution of the Bank classified documents, I need
to submit application to our payout Bank base on your decisions to the
subject matters.
At the same time you are hereby advise to keep all the information
regarding to your payment out of the pubic for the safety of your
Award  Prize sum of US$3 Million.
Thanks And Remains Blessed
Steve Richard (Payment Coordinator)
For Mega Millions Lotto Promo USA.
outbound_messages:
From: uv08531@m**************m
To: m************e@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-26 03:01:40
SUBJECT: Re: MEGA MILLION LOTTO,
Dear Maria, 
This is incredible news! I'm thrilled to have won the lottery. What steps do I need to take to claim my prize?
 Kind Regards,
Duncan Eells
___________________________________
Duncan Eells,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: uv08531@m**************m
To: m************e@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-27 15:08:53
SUBJECT: Re: Fill out the attached form and return back
Hi, 
How long do I have to claim the prize? I do not like to rush things like this and would like to put a reminder in my calendar.
 Kind Regards,
Duncan Eells
___________________________________
Duncan Eells,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: uv08531@m**************m
To: m************e@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-27 17:14:52
SUBJECT: Re: Attention: Lucky Winner
Hi, 
How many previous winners have there been for this prize? Is there any way you can prove to me that they received their sum?
 Kind Regards,
Duncan Eells
___________________________________
Duncan Eells,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
